text: Joe Yorke (born 7 December 1947) is a New Zealand equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of New Zealand Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Whanganui
title: Joe Yorke
